WESTERN FRONT,On the British front there is nothing of interest to report,South of the CURCQ, the French in a local operation last night captured the ridge between MOSLOY and PASSY, making an advance of about half a mile on a front of 2 miles - 275 prisoners (including 3 officers) v/ere taken,,2, ' ITALIAN FRONT^Tho operations on IJONTE VaL BELLA and COL DEL ROSSO continue b'iit no information has been received of their progress\, In addition to the prisoners reported, the Italians have taken 2 mountain guns and a number of machine guns and trench mortars.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1. 30th June, 19180Issued at 6U15 p,m.
